channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ohtani's historic 50-50 ball sells at auction for nearly $4.4M amid ongoing dispute over ownership

item.title: Decision to resentence Menendez brothers to arrive by the week's end: DA
item.description: LA District Attorney George Gascon was prompted to give an update on his timeline. The next scheduled court date is in November.

item.title: McDonald's shares fall as E. coli outbreak tied to Quarter Pounder kills 1 in US

item.title: American to pay $50 million fine for its treatment of disabled passengers
item.description: Airlines must be accountable for their treatment of passengers with disabilities, Transportation Secretary Pete Buttigieg said.
